chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
On the Confessors

The perfect confession to their King granted them companionship in heavenly rest. Through their examples and words, we find peace. They teach us to love the path of supreme peace.
chunks.original_latin:
De confessoribus. Hos perfecta suo servans confessio Regi
Fecit in aetheria consocios requie. Exemplis quorum dictisque in pace manentes,
Instruimur summae pacis amare viam.
